title: High AQI in Downtown
message: PM2.5 reached 180 ug/m3. Consider wearing a mask outdoors.

title: Water Outage Scheduled
message: Scheduled maintenance from 14:00 to 16:00. Store water in advance.

title: Heavy Traffic on Main Street
message: Accident reported. Use alternate route via Park Avenue.

title: Power Outage Restored
message: Power has been restored to all affected areas.

title: Vaccination Drive Today
message: Free flu vaccination available 9 AM - 5 PM at City Community Center.

title: Road Closure Alert
message: West Avenue closed for construction until Nov 10. Follow detour signs.
